alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 9:56AM CST until February 11 at 6:30PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Clarke, Wilcox and Monroe Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...Until Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Considerable flooding of agricultural land. At 43.0 feet, Access to Eureka Landing community stops, with access cut off. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 45.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue to fall, falling below flood stage by Friday afternoon. The river will then gradually fall to a stage of 30.1 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
